targets.query: SELECT last("used") FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /$server$/ GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("used") FROM "swap" WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /$server/ GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("total") FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /$server/ GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT "n_users" FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT last("total") FROM "swap" WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /$server/ GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT "value" FROM "viruses" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT "n_cpus" FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT last("free") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "fstype" = 'ext4') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "path" fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "fstype" = 'ext4') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "path" fill(null)
SELECT last("inodes_used")/last("inodes_total") * 100 FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "fstype" = 'ext4') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "path" fill(null)
SELECT last("tcp_established") as "tcp_established", mean("tcp_listen") as "tcp_listen" FROM "netstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("tx_errors") as "tx_errors", last("rx_errors") as "rx_errors" FROM "ethtool" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("running") as "running", mean("sleeping") as "sleeping", mean("zombies") as "zombies" FROM "processes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("used") as "memory_usage" FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter AND host =~ /$server/ GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" =~ /cpu[0-9].*/ AND "host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "cpu"
SELECT mean("usage_idle") as "cpu_idle" FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND "host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("usage_user") as "user", mean("usage_system") as "system" FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND "host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean("tcp_established") as "tcp_established", mean("tcp_listen") as "tcp_listen" FROM "netstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("inodes_total") as "inodes_total", mean("inodes_used") as "inodes_used", mean("inodes_free") as "inodes_free" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "path" = '/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "path" fill(null)

SELECT mean("inodes_total") as "inodes_total", mean("inodes_used") as "inodes_used", mean("inodes_free") as "inodes_free" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "path" = '/home') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "path" fill(null)
SELECT last("tx_packets") as "tx_packets", last("rx_packets") as "rx_packets" FROM "ethtool" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("tx_errors") as "tx_errors", last("rx_errors") as "rx_errors" FROM "ethtool" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("tx_dropped") as "tx_dropped" FROM "ethtool" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("tx_broadcast") as "tx_broadcast", last("rx_broadcast") as "rx_broadcast" FROM "ethtool" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("tx_multicast") as "tx_multicast", last("rx_multicast") as "rx_multicast" FROM "ethtool" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host
list.label: server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host
